name: Butter Run
description:
For this pastry you will need flour, a cup of water and a bar of butter…oh wait! Where’s the butter? Oh wait, here it is! Mix everything all together.

Maybe for this dessert it doesn’t need to have butter in it. Help it get out of this unknown situation and navigate your way out of the bowl by climbing onto the crumps of mix. Be careful where you jump and avoid the falling onto hot chocolate! If you fall, you will end up being part of the mix.

Remember, you’re only a bar of butter and you can start to melt.

COMMANDS:   USE THE WASD KEYS TO MOVE AND JUMP. 

A - LEFT

D- RIGHT

W - JUMP
